title: Calories in Rice Crispy Cereal
meta_description: Learn calories in rice crispy cereal per standard serving, including carbs, protein, fat, sodium, and quick tweaks for variations.
assumptions: Standard serving of unsweetened puffed rice cereal (e.g., Kellogg's Rice Krispies), dry, no milk or toppings added.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, fortification, and serving size; check product labels for exact values.

quick_answer.text: A 30 g serving of rice crispy cereal contains about 120 kcal and 28 g carbs.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in a serving of rice crispy cereal?
faqs.a: About 120 kcal per 30 g (1 cup) serving.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in rice crispy cereal?
faqs.a: Approximately 28 g total carbs per 30 g serving, with 0 g fiber.

faqs.q: Is rice crispy cereal high in protein?
faqs.a: No, only about 2 g protein per 30 g serving.

faqs.q: Does rice crispy cereal have fat?
faqs.a: Typically 0 g fat per serving, making it low-fat.

faqs.q: How much sodium in rice crispy cereal?
faqs.a: Around 190 mg per 30 g serving, due to fortification.
